# AI4Science Hub

> Curated resources for applying AI and machine learning to scientific research.

AI4Science Hub is a documentation site maintained by Fulcrum that aggregates learning resources, courses, tutorials, and tools for researchers working at the intersection of artificial intelligence and scientific discovery.

## Topics Covered

- Biology: Drug discovery, protein science, computational biology
- Chemistry: Cheminformatics, reaction prediction, molecular design
- Earth & Climate: Climate modeling, environmental research
- Materials: Materials informatics, property prediction, discovery
- Physics: Physics-informed ML, simulation
- Foundations: Programming, ML basics, getting started
- Methods: GNNs, transformers, generative models
- Tools: Software ecosystems by domain

## Site Structure

- /biology - Resources for AI in biological sciences
- /chemistry - Cheminformatics and computational chemistry
- /earth-climate - Climate and environmental ML
- /materials - Materials informatics resources
- /physics - Physics-informed machine learning
- /foundations - Foundational skills and prerequisites
- /methods - ML methods and architectures
- /tools - Software tools and libraries
- /about - About the project and how to contribute

## Maintainer

Fulcrum - https://fulcrum.science

## License

Content is provided for educational purposes. Individual resources linked may have their own licenses.
